name: University technology licenses or license options executed, by company characteristic: 2011, 2016, and 2021
description: University technology licenses or license options executed, by company characteristic: 2011, 2016, and 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: AUTM collects data on invention and patent-related activities of its member universities and hospitals. Responding institutions may report for any 12-month period ending in the identified year. Startup companies reported by universities in AUTM data refer only to those companies that were formed in the reporting year specifically to develop the technology being licensed. Counts of licenses to startups and small companies are mutually exclusive. Small companies are those with fewer than 500 employees.
sources: AUTM, AUTM Licensing Survey (various years), accessed April 2023.Science and Engineering Indicators
